Plot: In a fantasy world of opposing kingdoms, a 15-year old girl must find the fabled MirrorMask in order to save the kingdom and get home.
Title: Mirrormask
Writer: Neil Gaiman (story), Dave McKean (story), Neil Gaiman (teleplay)
Actors: Stephanie Leonidas, Jason Barry, Rob Brydon, Gina McKee
tomatoConsensus: While visually dazzling, there isn't enough story to hang all the fancy effects on.
